page.title: 14SHOPPING IN LEUCHARS
page.content: In Leuchars there are only a few shops. A survey showed that 70% of the Leuchars population did their main shopping in Dundee as there is only 1 newsagent, 1 butchers, 2 small supermarkets and 1 cafe in Leuchars. The other 30% of the Leuchars population is mostly old people and they use the shops in Leuchars. The main shopping days for Leuchars are Friday and Thursday and half day is Saturday for most shops. There are little problems with theft and all the shop keepers are pleased with the custom that there shops get.
